entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Cambridge
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:44 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 4.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Region of Waterloo Int'l Airport 03:42 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: 4.8°C
Pressure: 100.6 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 60 %
Dewpoint: -2.4°C
Wind: SE 18 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 40 percent chance of showers before morning. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A few showers. High 14.
entry.summary: A few showers ending in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 70 in the morning. High 14. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023
